text: Gambit is a 2012 British-American comedy movie directed by Michael Hoffman. It stars Colin Firth, Cameron Diaz, Alan Rickman and Stanley Tucci. It was released in November 21, 2012 in the United Kingdom and on April 25, 2014 in the United States. ==References== == Other websites == * * Category:2012 movies Category:2012 comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Hoffman
title: Gambit (2012 movie)
